tool_description: Get staking info of OHM and OHM forks. Using EthersJS to pull data directly from contracts.
name: fohmo-backend
title: fohmo-backend

api_list.name: GetFarmList
api_list.description: Gets list of valid OHM Forks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com/GetFarmList"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fohmo-backend.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
